<block>

Attributes

  • @identifier
  • @location
  • @position
  • @purpose

Content Model

( #PCDATA | activity | animal | color | currency | figure | foreign | material | material_format | place | plant | profession | purpose | ref | sub_recipe | time | tool | unit | name | note | people | q | sup )*

May Contain:

  • PCDATA
  • <activity>
  • <animal>
  • <color>
  • <currency>
  • <figure>
  • <foreign>
  • <material>
  • <material_format>
  • <name>
  • <note>
  • <people>
  • <place>
  • <plant>
  • <profession>
  • <purpose>
  • <q>
  • <ref>
  • <sub_recipe>
  • <sup>
  • <time>
  • <tool>
  • <unit>

May be contained in:

  • <entry>
  • <entry_group>
